text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/nutritionproduct-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
active ActiveThe product can be used.
inactive InactiveThe product is not expected or allowed to be used.
entered-in-error Entered in ErrorThis electronic record should never have existed, though it is possible that real-world decisions were based on it. (If real-world activity has occurred, the status should be "cancelled" rather than "entered-in-error".).

name: NutritionProductStatus
title: Nutrition Product Status
description: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a product.

concept.definition: The product is not expected or allowed to be used.

This electronic record should never have existed, though it is possible that real-world decisions were based on it.  (If real-world activity has occurred, the status should be "cancelled" rather than "entered-in-error".).
